getFees(address).details: This method could return a basis points (bps) fee or a flat fee depending on the context of use.

params.currency: The address of the currency for which to retrieve the fees fee.

returns._0: uint256 The fees fee for the specified currency.

params.currency: The currency to associate fees with. Use address(0) for the native coin.

getFees(address).notice: Gets the fees fee for the specified currency.

setFees(uint256).notice: Sets a new treasury fee.Only the owner can call this function.

setFees(uint256,address).notice: Sets a new treasury fee.Only the owner can call this function.
